verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O, how I love Jesus, newline O, how I love Jesus, newline O, how I love Jesus; newline Because He first loved me.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: To me He is so wonderful, newline To me He is so wonderful, newline To me He is so wonderful; newline Because He first loved me.

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: O, how I love God's Word, newline O, how I love God's Word, newline O, how I love God's Word; newline It tells of His love for me.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a name I love to hear, newline I love to sing its worth; newline It sounds like music in my ear, newline The sweetest name on earth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: It tells me of a Savior's love, newline Who died to set me free; newline It tells me of His precious blood, newline The sinner's perfect plea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: It tells me what my Father hath, newline In store for ev'ry day; newline And tho' I tread a darksome path, newline Yields sunshine all the way.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: It tells of One whose loving heart, newline Can feel my deepest woe; newline Who in each sorrow bears a part, newline That none can bear below.
